---
title: Advanced Mathematical Concepts
description: Complex mathematical formulas and notation
weight: 2
---

# Advanced Mathematical Concepts

## Calculus

The fundamental theorem of calculus:

$$
\frac{d}{dx} \int_a^x f(t) dt = f(x)
$$

## Linear Algebra

Eigenvalue equation:

$$
Av = \lambda v
$$

## Statistics

Normal distribution probability density function:

$$
f(x) = \frac{1}{\sigma\sqrt{2\pi}} e^{-\frac{1}{2}\left(\frac{x-\mu}{\sigma}\right)^2}
$$

## Greek Letters and Symbols

Common symbols: $\alpha$, $\beta$, $\gamma$, $\Delta$, $\Sigma$, $\Omega$

## Fractions and Roots

$$
\sqrt[n]{x^n + y^n} \neq x + y
$$

## Aligned Equations

$$
\begin{aligned}
f(x) &= (x+1)^2 \\
     &= x^2 + 2x + 1
\end{aligned}
$$
